segments.text: Looking at the boy on the stool, I can't help but feel a bit nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for the cookie jar, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling, and it makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is eagerly waiting for a cookie, adding to the tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread, hoping he doesn't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so tense, with the boy balancing precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman isn't noticing any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated, wishing someone would intervene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination to get the cookies is both amusing and worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he manages to get down safely without causing a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
